rightValue.stringValue: I am currently under debt review
I am currently under sequestration in terms of a court order

decisions.name: Check_Existing_PA_or_Bond_Opps
decisions.label: Check Existing PA or Bond Opps

decisions.name: Is_there_Existing_PA_for_Close
decisions.label: Is there Existing PA for Close?

Flow.description:
Flow Description: Creates a Pre-Approval or Bond Opportunity and is launched from the Wrap Up Opportunity H2 flow
Front-End Access: Work Opportunity button on the Opportunity record page.

formulas.name: missingBondQuestions
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!mainApplicant.Marital_agreement__c}, ""), "Marital Agreement" + BR(), null) + IF(ISPICKVAL({!mainApplicant.Are_you_buying_your_first_home__c}, ""), "Are you buying your first home" + BR(), null)

formulas.name: missingQuestions
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!mainApplicant.Marital_agreement__c}, ""), "Marital Agreement" + BR(), null) + IF(ISPICKVAL({!mainApplicant.Are_you_buying_your_first_home__c}, ""), "Are you buying your first home" + BR(), null) + IF(ISPICKVAL({!mainApplicant.In_what_capacity_are_you_buying__c}, ""), "In what capacity are you buying"+ BR(), null) + IF(ISPICKVAL({!mainApplicant.Do_you_have_a_South_African_ID_number__c}, ""), "Do you have a South African ID"+ BR(), null) + IF(ISPICKVAL({!mainApplicant.Do_you_own_an_existing_property__c}, ""), "Do you own an existing property"+ BR(), null) + IF(ISPICKVAL({!mainApplicant.Nationality__c}, ""), "Nationality" + BR(), null) + IF(ISPICKVAL({!mainApplicant.What_is_your_employment_status__c}, ""), "Employment Status" + BR(), null) + IF(ISPICKVAL({!mainApplicant.What_is_your_credit_status__c}, ""), "Credit Status" + BR(), null)

Flow.label: Create Pre-Approval or Bond Opportunity H2

fields.name: closedSelfEmployed_0
fields.fieldText:
The following Opportunity stage has been updated to Closed Lost:


Opportunity: {!Get_Updated_Opp_Self_Employed_0.Name}

Status: {!Get_Updated_Opp_Self_Employed_0.Status__c}

Employment Status: Self-Employed


The Opportunity should be referred to a Bond Specialist.

value.stringValue: Create Pre-Approval or Bond Opportunity Workflow

fields.name: messageHelp
fields.fieldText: The following additional Closed Opportunities exist on {!generalOpportunityNameFormula}:

fields.name: paTxt
fields.fieldText: Would you like to create a new Pre-Approval Opportunity for this General Opportunity?

fields.name: bondTxt
fields.fieldText: Would you like to create a new Bond Opportunity for this General Opportunity?

value.stringValue: Create Pre-Approval or Bond Opportunity Workflow

fields.name: inProgressMsg_0
fields.fieldText:
The following additional Opportunities are in progress for: {!generalOpportunityNameFormula}


You are not allowed to Create a new Opportunity while another is in progress.


If the stage is set to Closed, you will be able to Create a new Opportunity for this existing General Opportunity.

fields.name: requiredQuestionsPA
fields.fieldText:
The following Interview questions are mandatory when converting to a Pre-Approval:

{!missingQuestions}

fields.name: requiredQuestionsBond
fields.fieldText:
The following Interview questions are mandatory when converting to a Bond:

{!missingBondQuestions}

fields.name: Do_you_earn_additional_income_from

fields.name: poorCreditPrompt
